entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 7.1°C
